app.name: Authgear
email.welcome-message.subject: Welcome!
email.forgot-password.subject: [{AppName}] Reset password instruction
email.verification.subject: [{AppName}] Email Verification Instruction
email.setup-primary-oob.subject: Signing up at {AppName}
email.setup-secondary-oob.subject: Signing up at {AppName}
email.setup-secondary-magic-link.subject: Signing up at {AppName}
email.authenticate-primary-oob.subject: Logging in to {AppName}
email.authenticate-secondary-oob.subject: Logging in to {AppName}
error-login-id-required: Please enter your {variant, select, phone{phone number} email {email address} username {username} other {email address or username}}.
error-oob-otp-code-required: Please enter the one-time password you just received.
error-totp-code-required: Please enter the 6-digit code from the authenticator app / device.
error-verification-code-required: Please enter the verification code you just received.
error-recovery-code-required: Please enter any unused 10-letter recovery code you stored previously.
error-confirm-password-required: Please enter your new password again.
error-phone-number-format: The phone number you entered is not in a correct format. Please select your country or region first, and then enter the phone number in the way that you dial it.
error-invalid-email: The email address you entered is not in a correct format. Please make ensure the email address has the @ sign, followed by the email domain, e.g. user@example.com
error-invalid-username: The username you entered is not in a correct format. Please try using a username consisting of alphanumeric characters (a-z, A-Z, and 0-9) only.
error-totp-code-format: The code you entered is not in a correct format. Please make ensure it is a 6-digit code.
error-oob-otp-code-format: The one-time password you entered is not in a correct format. Please make ensure it is a 6-digit code.
error-verification-code-format: The verification code you entered is not in a correct format. Please make ensure it is a 6-digit code.
error-recovery-code-format: The recovery code you entered is not in a correct format. Please make ensure it is a 10-letter code.
error-uri-format: The URL you entered is not in a correct format. URLs typically start with https://, e.g. https://example.com/
error-email-not-allowed: The email address you entered is disallowed. Please contact the customer support if you think the email address should be valid.
error-username-not-allowed: The username you entered is disallowed. Please avoid using reserved usernames like `admin`.
error-invalid-web3-network: Please sign up with {chainID, select, _1{Ethereum Mainnet} _5{Ethereum Goerli} _137{Polygon Mainnet} _80001{Polygon Mumbai} other{}} network.
error-account-not-found: { IdentityTypeIncoming, select, login_id {{ LoginIDTypeIncoming, select, email {This email} phone {This phone number} username {This username} other {This identity} }} oauth {This email} other {This identity} } cannot be found. Please ensure it is correct.
error-account-conflict: { IdentityTypeIncoming, select, login_id { { LoginIDTypeIncoming, select, email {This email} phone {This phone number} username {This username} other {This identity} } } oauth {This email} other {This identity} } is associated with an account.
error-suggestion-sign-in: { IntentKind, select, IntentAuthenticate {{ IdentityTypeExisting, select, login_id {Do you want to sign in with { LoginIDTypeExisting, select, email {email} phone {phone number} username {username} other {login ID} }?} oauth {Do you want to sign in with { OAuthProviderTypeExisting, select, google {Google} facebook {Facebook} github {GitHub} linkedin {LinkedIn} azureadv2 {Azure AD} azureadb2c {Azure AD B2C} adfs {AD FS} apple {Apple} wechat {Wechat} other {OAuth} }?} other {Do you want to sign in?} }} other {} }
error-suggestion-connect-oauth: { IntentKind, select, IntentAuthenticate {{ IdentityTypeExisting, select, login_id {{ IdentityTypeIncoming, select, oauth {You can link it with your { OAuthProviderTypeIncoming, select, google {Google} facebook {Facebook} github {GitHub} linkedin {LinkedIn} azureadv2 {Azure AD} azureadb2c {Azure AD B2C} adfs {AD FS} apple {Apple} wechat {Wechat} other {OAuth} } account via the settings page after signing in.} other {} }} other {} }} other {} }
error-invalid-credentials: {AuthenticationType, select, password{Incorrect password} totp{Incorrect 6-digit code from the authenticator app / device} oob_otp_sms {Incorrect SMS one-time password} oob_otp_email{Incorrect Email one-time password} recovery_code {Incorrect recovery code} other {Invalid credentials}}
error-max-length: Expect string with length less than or equal to {expected, plural, one{# character} other{# characters}}
error-type: Please enter {expected, select, number{a number} integer{an integer} other{}}
error-minimum: Please enter a number greater than or equal to {minimum}
error-maximum: Please enter a number less than or equal to {maximum}
error-password-reset-failed: This reset password link is invalid, used or expired. Please request a new one.
error-duplicated-authenticator: {AuthenticatorType, select, oob_otp_sms{You have already set up this phone number for authentication. Maybe you want to set up another phone number?} oob_otp_email{You have already set up this email address for authentication. Maybe you want to set up another email address?} other{You have already set up this authenticator. Maybe want to set up another one?}}
error-developer-reauthentication: [To Developer] You just triggered reauthentication but the setup is incorrect. Please visit https://docs.authgear.com/integrate/reauthentication
error-developer-email-required: [To Developer] The OAuth provider does not return the email claim. If you expect the provider to always return the claim, please double check the configuration of your provider. If you expect the claim to be optional, please update the configuration of Authgear in the portal.
error-email-required-github: Please add a "Public Email" to your GitHub profile. Manage your profile here: https://github.com/settings/profile
error-verification-code-invalid: Verification code is invalid, used or expired. Please request a new one.
error-remove-last-identity: You cannot disconnect the last identity. You need to keep at least 1 identity.
error-remove-last-primary-authenticator: You cannot remove the last primary authenticator. You need to keep at least 1 primary authenticator for an identity.
error-remove-last-secondary-authenticato: You cannot remove the last secondary authenticator. You need to keep at least 1 secondary authenticator to keep 2-step verification enabled.
error-new-password-typo: The re-typed new password does not match the new password. Please ensure the two match.
error-web-ui-invalid-session-retry:
This page is invalid or has expired.

Please return and retry your request.
error-web-ui-invalid-session-return:
This page is invalid or has expired.

Please return and retry your request.
error-rate-limited: Please wait for a moment before retrying.
error-usage-limit-exceeded: [To Developer] Your project has exceeded the usage limit. Please review your subscription.
error-webhook-invalid-response: [To Developer] Your webhook handler did NOT return a valid response. Please visit https://docs.authgear.com/webhooks/webhooks
error-webhook-delivery-timeout: Operation is disallowed because the webhook delivery resulted in timeout.
error-scheduled-deletion-by-admin: Administrator has disabled your account and your account will be deleted on {date, date, long}
error-scheduled-deletion-by-end-user: You have deactivated your account and your account will be deleted on {date, date, long}
error-network: Your device is offline. Please check your network connection first.
error-invalid-selected-image: The selected image is invalid. Try another one.
error-no-passkey: Passkey is not found on your device. {type, select, password{Sign in with password instead?} oob_otp_email{Sign in with one-time password instead?} oob_otp_sms{Sign in with one-time password instead?} other{Try another device?}}
error-passkey-empty-allow-credentials: Sign in with passkey is not fully supported on this device.{variant, select, phone{ Please continue with your phone number.} email{ Please continue with your email address.} username{ Please continue with your username.} other{ Please continue with your email address or username.}}
error-passkey-duplicate: You have a passkey on this device already.
error-metamask-unauthorized: You did not authorize the operation.
error-metamask-unsupported-method: The requested method is not supported.
error-metamask-disconnected: The provider is disconnected from the specified chain.
public-signup-disabled-notice: Please contact the system administrator for creating new accounts.
verify-via-button-label: Verify via {loginIDType, select, email {email} phone {phone} other {loginIDType}}
create-device-token-label: Do not ask again on this device
oauth-branding-azureadv2: Sign in with Microsoft Azure AD
oauth-branding-azureadb2c: Sign in with Microsoft Azure AD B2C
oauth-branding-adfs: Sign in with Microsoft AD FS
login-id-placeholder: {variant, select, email {Email address} username {Username} other {Email address or username}}
use-text-login-id-description: Use {variant, select, email {email address} username {username} other {email address or username}} instead
oob-otp-description: We have sent a {length}-character one-time password to {target}. Please enter the one-time password below to continue
oob-otp-resend-button-rate-limited-hint: You have exceeded the maximum of attempts for entering the one-time password. Please get a new one-time password.
oob-otp-sms-is-not-supported: Sending SMS is not supported. Please contact administrator.
oob-otp-sms-is-not-supported-with-custom: Sending SMS is not supported. Please contact customer support.
whatsapp-otp-description: Use your number ({target}) to send this 6-digit code in WhatsApp
whatsapp-otp-no-code-description:
We didn''t see a message from you. 
Do you want to resend it?
whatsapp-otp-invalid-code-description:
You have entered a wrong code. 
Do you want to resend it?
whatsapp-otp-scan-code-button-label: No, scan code on other device
whatsapp-otp-scan-code-description: Scan the QR code with WhatsApp on your device to start the chat
whatsapp-otp-pre-filled-message:
Verify {target} with OTP {otp} 
Press send on WhatsApp then return to the App
magic-link-otp-initial-description:
We have sent a magic link to {target}. 
Please visit the link to continue
magic-link-otp-invalid-code-description: This magic link is invalid, used or expired. Please request a new one.
verify-magic-link-initial-description: Please click the button below to approve login
verify-magic-link-invalid-code-descripti: This magic link is invalid, used or expired. Please request a new one.
verify-magic-link-matched-description:
You are successfully authenticated. 
You can close this window.
verify-user-description: We have sent a {length}-character code to {target}. Please enter the code below to continue
verify-user-resend-button-rate-limited-h: You have exceeded the maximum of attempts for entering the one-time password. Please get a new one-time password.
verify-user-success-description: You have successfully verified your account.
use-login-id-key: Use {key, select, email{email address} username{username} phone{phone number} other{{key}}} instead
connect-web3-account-page-change-account: You can change the connected account by opening the MetaMask extension
missing-web3-wallet-page-description: {provider} is either missing or not supported for your browser.
prompt-create-passkey-page-description: Your device supports passkey authentication. Set up a passkey for faster and safer logins. If you use biometrics, we will never see or store your biometric data.
password-policy-title: Your new password must follow the below rules:
password-policy-minimum-length: Minimum {length, plural, one{# character} other{# characters}}
password-policy-reuse: No reuse of {size, plural, one{# previous password} other{# previous passwords}} / previous password within {day, plural, one{# day} other{# days}}
forgot-password-email-description: Enter your email address to get reset password instruction
forgot-password-send-to-email-descriptio: You will receive a link to reset your password at this email address.
forgot-password-phone-description: Enter your phone number to get reset password instruction
forgot-password-send-to-phone-descriptio: You will receive a link to reset your password at this number.
forgot-password-success-description: If you have an account, please follow the instruction sent to {target} to reset your password
reset-password-description: Please enter your new password below.
reset-password-success-description: You have successfully reset your password. You can now sign in with it.
change-password-page-description: Please enter your new password below.
change-password-page-description--force: Your password does not meet the password policy requirements. Please enter a new password.
change-secondary-password-page-descripti: Please enter your new password below.
Your additional password does not meet the password policy requirements. Please enter a new additional password.
logout-button-hint: Click the button to log out
confirm-terminate-other-sessions-hint: You will be logged out in other devices
consent-scopes-full-userinfo: Access full information in your profile such as email address, phone number, name.
consent-policy-and-tos-link-desc: See {clientName}’s privacy policy and terms of service.
consent-tos-link-desc: See {clientName}’s terms of service.
settings-page-security-section-descripti: These can be used to make sure that it''s really you signing in.
settings-page-mfa-section-description: Manage your list of 2-step verification authenticators
settings-page-primary-password-descripti: Last updated at {time, datetime, short} UTC
settings-page-primary-oob-otp-descriptio: Added at {time, datetime, short} UTC
settings-page-secondary-password-descrip: Last updated at {time, datetime, short} UTC
settings-page-recovery-code-description: These codes allow you to sign in even you lost access to your apps, devices, phones or email accounts.
settings-page-session-section-title: Signed in devices{hasThirdPartyClient, select, true{ and apps} other{}}
settings-page-session-section-descriptio: Manage your authenticated devices{hasThirdPartyClient, select, true{ and apps} other{}}
settings-page-biometric-section-descript: Manage your biometric logins on your authenticated devices
revoke-all-device-tokens-button-label: Forget all trusted devices that can skip 2-step verification
no-device-tokens-description: You do not have any trusted devices that can skip 2-step verification.
settings-my-profile-empty-label: Add personal information to complete your profile
settings-identity-description: {count, plural, one{This is the method to sign in to your account} other{These are the methods to sign in to your account}}
settings-biometric-description: You''ve enabled biometric logins on these devices.

settings-totp-item-description: Added at {time, datetime, short} UTC
settings-sessions-title: Signed in devices{hasThirdPartyClient, select, true{ and apps} other{}}
settings-sessions-authorized-devices-des: You’re currently signed in to your account on these devices
settings-sessions-item-description: {isCurrent, select, true {{desc} · Active Now} other {{desc} · {time, datetime, short} UTC}}
settings-sessions-confirmation-desc: Are you sure to terminate the session?
settings-sessions-confirmation-all-desc: Are you sure to terminate all other sessions?
settings-sessions-authorized-apps-descri: You used your account to sign in to these sites and apps.
settings-sessions-authorized-apps-item-d: Added at {time, datetime, short} UTC {hasFullUserInfoAccess, select, true{ · Has access to full profile} other{}}
settings-sessions-authorized-apps-remove: Are you sure to remove the authorized app {clientName}?
settings-oob-otp-item-description: Added at {time, datetime, short} UTC
enter-login-id-page-description--change: Your current {key} is {displayID}. Please enter your new {key}.
setup-totp-instead: Set up authenticator app / device instead
enter-oob-otp-email-instead: Send one-time password to {target} instead via Email
enter-oob-otp-sms-instead: Send one-time password to {target} instead via SMS
setup-magic-link-otp-instead: Set up magic link 2-step verification instead
enter-recovery-code-instead-v1: Having Trouble? <button class="btn secondary-btn" type="submit">Use recovery code</button>
enter-recovery-code-instead-with-custome: Having Trouble? or contact customer support
setup-totp-description: Scan the QR code or enter the key with your authenticator device / app
setup-totp-get-google-authenticator-desc: If you don''t have any authenticator device / app, you can get the Google Authenticator App from Google Play Store or Apple App Store
setup-totp-use-google-authenticator-desc: In the App, select Set up account and choose Scan barcode
setup-totp-code-description: After scanning the code, enter the 6-digit code below
enter-totp-description: Enter the 6-digit code you see in the authenticator app / device
enter-totp-code-placeholder: 6-digit code from the authenticator app / device
recovery-code-not-available-description: You do not have any recovery codes yet. Get new codes by clicking the button below.
recovery-code-storage-description:
If you lost access to your authentication device, use these recovery codes to recover your account. 
Keep them somewhere safe but accessible.
recovery-code-consumption-description: You can only use each code once
return-page-description: Please return to where you were to continue. If you were interacting with an mobile app, please switch back to the app. If you were interacting with a website, please switch back to that tab.
wechat-auth-with-qr-code-description: Please scan the QR code in your WeChat app to sign in.
wechat-auth-with-app-description: Click the below button to continue WeChat Login
toc-pp-footer: By registering, you agree to our {variant, select, both{Terms of Service and Privacy Policy} termsOnly{Terms of Service} privacyOnly{Privacy Policy} other{}}
settings-profile-edit-title: Edit {variant, select, name{Name} email{Email} phone_number{Phone Number} preferred_username{Username} profile{Profile URL} picture{Profile Picture} website{Website URL} gender{Gender} birthdate{Birthdate} zoneinfo{Timezone} locale{Preferred Language} address{Address} other{{label}}}
settings-profile-edit-remove-confirmatio: Are you sure to remove the profile picture?
custom-attribute-numeric-hint-minimum: Please enter a number greater than or equal to {minimum}
custom-attribute-numeric-hint-maximum: Please enter a number less than or equal to {maximum}
custom-attribute-numeric-hint-minimum-ma: Please enter a number between {minimum} and {maximum}
account-deletion-description: By deleting the account, all data will be permanently deleted and we will not be able to retrieve it. If you continue, your account will be deleted on {date, date, long}
account-deletion-success-description: Your account has been deactivated and the data will be deleted on {date, date, long}
account-status-contact-support-with-link: Please contact customer support.
tutorial-signup-login: This is the Signup & Login page of your project. Try sign up and be the first user of your app!
tutorial-settings: The Account Setting page is ready to go. Your users can manage their security and profile here. Integrate this page to your apps for full auth experience.
